biotools.summary: Limonada (Lipid Membrane Open Network And Database) is  a database dedicated to the simulation of biological membranes. limonada intends to provide an open library of membranes, along with the description of lipids, topologies and forcefields mandatory for their molecular dynamics simulations.

bioschemas.name: LIMONADA
bioschemas.summary: Limonada (Lipid Membrane Open Network And Database) is  a database dedicated to the simulation of biological membranes. limonada intends to provide an open library of membranes, along with the description of lipids, topologies and forcefields mandatory for their molecular dynamics simulations.
